string-array.name: intro_descr
string-array.item: ROS-Mobile is an Android application designed for dynamic control and visualization of mobile robotic systems operated by the Robot Operating System (ROS).
Create your own configurations for each of your robotic systems.
Enhance your configurations by defining customizable nodes in the Details section.
Monitoring of your robotic system, for example by displaying an occupancy grid map.
Controlling of your robotic system, for example using teleoperational control via the joystick node.
Directly accessing the robot system via the embedded SSH terminal.
